title: Combine Two Bytes into a Word
description: WORD_OF_BYTE composes a Word of 2 separate bytes B0 and B1.
name: WORD_OF_BYTE

input.name: B1
input.description: The first byte to be combined, which will be shifted left by 8 bits.

input.name: B0
input.description: The second byte to be combined, which will remain in its original position.

return_value.description: The resulting WORD obtained by combining B1 and B0.
